text: Daniel Revenu (5 December 1942 â€“ 2 January 2024) was a French fencer and Olympic champion. Revenu received a gold medal in foil team at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City. He participated and received medals at the 1964, 1968, 1972 and 1976 summer Olympics."1968 Summer Olympics - Mexico City, Mexico - Fencing" databaseOlympics.com (Retrieved on June 21, 2008) Revenu died on 2 January 2024, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for France Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:French fencers Category:Sportspeople from Centre-Val de Loire Category:People from Indre
title: Daniel Revenu
